dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Unauthorized Photos in a website you host]
dmca.body:
Nc

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 08, 2005 1:57 AM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Unauthorized Photos in a website you host]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
From:         - Fri Apr 08 01:54:31 2005
X-Mozilla-Status:         0001
X-Mozilla-Status2:         00000000
Received:         from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by
mail with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50) id
1DJlFo-0001kR-MH for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 07 Apr 2005 23:38:00 -0500
Received:         from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1DJlFn-000231-Sw for
abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 07 Apr 2005 23:38:00 -0500
Received:         (qmail 13620 invoked from network); 8 Apr 2005 04:37:59
-0000
Received:         from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110) by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 8 Apr 2005 04:37:59 -0000
Received:         from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by
mail with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50) id
1DJlFl-0001jo-BJ for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 07 Apr 2005 23:37:57 -0500
Received:         from mail0.globat.com ([203.22.204.30]) by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from agencia@54once.com) with esmtp
(Exim) id 1DJlFk-0001qj-Ce for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 07 Apr 2005
23:37:57 -0500
Received:         from globat.com (tasmania.inside.globat.com [10.1.1.75]) by
mail0.globat.com (8.12.11/8.12.9) with SMTP id j384bOFe013358 for
<abuse@theplanet.com>; Thu, 7 Apr 2005 21:37:29 -0700 (PDT) (envelope-from
agencia@54once.com)
Received:         (qmail 22844 invoked from network); 8 Apr 2005 04:37:23
-0000
Received:         from unknown (HELO pendex) (200.60.163.5) by
tasmania.globat.com with SMTP; 8 Apr 2005 04:37:23 -0000
Message-ID:         <001801c53bf4$a903e170$0800a8c0@pendex>
From:         Agencia de Modelos 54once <agencia@54once.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date:         Thu, 7 Apr 2005 23:37:03 -0500
MIME-Version:         1.0
Content-Type:         multipart/alternative;
boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0012_01C53BCA.B3BF04C0"
X-Priority:         3
X-MSMail-Priority:         Normal
X-Mailer:         Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2527
X-MimeOLE:         Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2527
Received-SPF:         none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 203.22.204.30 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of 54once.com) client-ip=203.22.204.30;
envelope-from=agencia@54once.com; helo=mail0.globat.com;
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -98.2
Cc:         legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject:         [ABUSE] Unauthorized Photos in a website you host
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.5
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -98.2



Dear Mr. Peter Pathos,
Dear Sirs:

My name is Manuel Carrasco and I'm the Director from Agencia de Modelos
54once, a models agency located in Peru, South America.

In your servers is hosted a website called *JOVENCITASPERUVIP.COM*.
These people are using copyrighted pictures from our company website without
our authorization. Their business is about illegal prostitution and call
girls as you could read about this in their Contactanos link:
"/We attend to executives gentleman, foreigners and businessmen to your home
or hotels/". As I read in your User Policy, they are not only doing
copyright infringement with our pictures but also attempting with your own
hosting policy.

Our business is about real fashion models, and as you can imagine we feel
very upset about this, not only for our well gained name in almost 9 years,
but for our models.

I really hope you'll do something to give us a solution to this situation.

Best regards,

Manuel Carrasco
Director
Agencia de Modelos 54once
Lima - Per
